results.summary: The agent report is accurate in identifying the root cause and causal chain but lacks some metric details and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks explicit mention of CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified VCORE and DDR percentages but missed CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is accurate in identifying root causes and provides logical reasoning but lacks some metric details and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain includes CM, DDR, and VCORE but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The report accurately mentions VCORE 29.32% but misses other specific metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations are provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and reasoning but lacks some causal chain details and practical actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and MMDVFS as root causes, but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured, but lacks explicit mention of the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical recommendations are provided.
